1644390.name: HyperFeat
1644390.description:
HyperFeat is a top down 2D bullethell with roguelike elements, fight different spaceships in the arena you've found yourself in and try to survive as long as possible.


Welcome to the arena, after selecting your starting upgrade you will have to survive wave after wave of different enemies attacking you, each wave being randomly selected. Gain more upgrades along the way while trying to fend for your life.

*15 different enemies from 5 different races
*15 different items ranging from passive buffs to active items
